Header: Sajith Premadasa warmly welcomed in Hambantota
Content: COLOMBO (News 1st) â€“ UNP Deputy Leader Sajith Premadasa was welcomed amidst profuse cheering as he arrived in his electoral district, Hambantota following the Working Committee meeting of the UNP. Simultaneously, an occasion to vest the 229th model village in Hambantota with the people is underway at Sooriyawewa, Bellagaswewa under the auspices of UNP Deputy Leader Sajith Premadasa.
